46122358-650a-4d90-8000-d34e79466c88.name: 战斗反射
46122358-650a-4d90-8000-d34e79466c88.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

f0c2168c-7710-4cd7-81af-0abe30543aa9.name: Fit, Very
f0c2168c-7710-4cd7-81af-0abe30543aa9.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

9c181cdf-5e7c-4ab5-9d47-19621555a82d.name: 高痛阈
9c181cdf-5e7c-4ab5-9d47-19621555a82d.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

c77a0e86-6f80-4c5c-ac79-2c02299809ae.name: Off-Hand Weapon Training (@Weapon@)
c77a0e86-6f80-4c5c-ac79-2c02299809ae.notes: Replaces equal-named technique on p. B232

8e5aa211-9a6a-4010-9ede-3b01536ccc81.name: 易于命中
8e5aa211-9a6a-4010-9ede-3b01536ccc81.notes: 其他人可以将你的双眼作为攻击目标仅受到 -6 命中减值

a0f0cb27-739d-4a7d-bfc8-3aeccd098838.name: 标志性装备
a0f0cb27-739d-4a7d-bfc8-3aeccd098838.notes: 对于一般用钱买来的装备，例如武器与铠甲而言，每 1 点此优势给予这些装备最多等于模组中平均开始财富值 50% 的额外价值（但绝不会是现金）。

82b22463-5818-4c51-8b7c-56303bbd37a4.name: 健康
82b22463-5818-4c51-8b7c-56303bbd37a4.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

7adb81dc-e22b-4203-8d75-b2308b8159a8.name: 幸运
7adb81dc-e22b-4203-8d75-b2308b8159a8.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

dbd37da4-5977-4f47-985d-a5a235e3f96c.name: Choose a total of -50 points in disadvantages that suit character image and background.
dbd37da4-5977-4f47-985d-a5a235e3f96c.notes: Here are a few categories to inspire you. Do not take the same trait twice and do not take opposing traits.

982f02e3-7017-4c52-b186-a9e1c8f2974c.name: Antisocial
982f02e3-7017-4c52-b186-a9e1c8f2974c.notes: Go light on these problems if you intend to specialize in social skills.

c7c9a456-4e52-49d7-b1e7-840975747f72.name: 偏见（@阶级、民族、国家、宗教、 性别或是物种@）

860c4293-13e7-4d61-ae44-0dc18e74719d.name: 范围：任何与你不同的人

7c0040bf-230f-4f40-803c-d6d1e19d0134.name: 笨拙
7c0040bf-230f-4f40-803c-d6d1e19d0134.notes: Go light on these problems if you plan to focus on physical skills – particularly combat skills.

fcf849c4-5bb8-481b-ac2f-34c105e43d7a.name: Delusion (@anything that overplays your expertise or “natural element"@)

113bb830-d79d-4ddb-8a0e-dc32f7c563f7.name: Delusion (Guns are no match for fists!)

ea080e00-014b-462d-a829-44cea0561600.name: Delusion (Reality works just like the internet)

173b0729-1388-47c2-9cdd-57ef019ad931.name: 执念
173b0729-1388-47c2-9cdd-57ef019ad931.notes: @Beat a specific rival or win a specific tournament@

c48b0215-8e1d-4a91-a9ea-781f549e5cc2.name: Dimwitted
c48b0215-8e1d-4a91-a9ea-781f549e5cc2.notes: Go light on these problems if you hope to play an intellectual with many technical skills

58e2a6ad-dbc8-47b7-bbdd-1c39f58c8943.name: Intolerance (@Rival nation or other large group@)

fe5d333e-593a-4f0d-a3b5-4c06f623ed97.name: 范围：任何与你不同的人

93f8a0c6-25f8-4185-87be-85ad1b4c2adb.name: 视力不良（远视）
93f8a0c6-25f8-4185-87be-85ad1b4c2adb.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

5e1cebf6-4fe2-4cfd-9c99-937f6cba2bd3.name: 视力不良（近视）
5e1cebf6-4fe2-4cfd-9c99-937f6cba2bd3.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

bc1d6984-4ab0-4488-b629-523ae96d384b.name: 执念
bc1d6984-4ab0-4488-b629-523ae96d384b.notes: @with a specifc computer hack, invention, research project, etc.@

f1acc00c-a345-4cb3-9960-47ea0b9f750c.name: Trademark (@any design, methodology, or means of executing a technical task that’s uniquely yours@)

f5ad05eb-3701-4fd5-b926-24c874a8d67a.name: Trademark (@any design, methodology, or means of executing a technical task that’s uniquely yours@)

6fb295f3-52aa-4af7-a1d1-891ad1c79e86.name: 执念
6fb295f3-52aa-4af7-a1d1-891ad1c79e86.notes: @with bringing a criminal to justice, exacting revenge, solving a particular case, etc.@

7603e418-0dec-4c8a-9184-62a5ed5ab86a.name: 和平主义：不能伤害无辜

613fdf7d-1805-4b82-823f-bcce54cacd4e.name: Compulsive Behavior
613fdf7d-1805-4b82-823f-bcce54cacd4e.notes: @a skilled activity such as hacking computers, modifying cars, or working out@

458a1286-ab34-4ffc-8d70-bb8379f5ebd4.name: Insomniac (Mild)
458a1286-ab34-4ffc-8d70-bb8379f5ebd4.notes: 两个失眠周期之间相隔 3d 天，由 GM 秘密投骰

9f47329e-dad2-4a85-bdd8-7437d25665c4.name: Insomniac (Severe)
9f47329e-dad2-4a85-bdd8-7437d25665c4.notes: 两个失眠周期之间相隔 2d-1 天，由 GM 秘密投骰

5e98d781-7447-44a8-a754-28dba1feb146.name: Out of Shape
5e98d781-7447-44a8-a754-28dba1feb146.notes: Go light on these problems if you plan to focus on physical skills – particularly combat skills.

59984f19-6741-49a9-b1d9-542781e43120.name: 期待陪伴
59984f19-6741-49a9-b1d9-542781e43120.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

16391155-fd0a-4f7f-a9dd-2075e7ed555d.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
16391155-fd0a-4f7f-a9dd-2075e7ed555d.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

d82e1e9f-a275-409d-9fc2-203f93856b82.name: Insomniac (Mild)
d82e1e9f-a275-409d-9fc2-203f93856b82.notes: 两个失眠周期之间相隔 3d 天，由 GM 秘密投骰

6631be60-285a-41ea-bd55-439341f1ecb0.name: Insomniac (Severe)
6631be60-285a-41ea-bd55-439341f1ecb0.notes: 两个失眠周期之间相隔 2d-1 天，由 GM 秘密投骰

4d1cdfea-15a1-4006-9f19-94435483ed06.name: Socially Awkward
4d1cdfea-15a1-4006-9f19-94435483ed06.notes: Go light on these problems if you intend to specialize in social skills.

1c8b4290-7fb0-4299-bc46-deb54b174d2f.name: 和平主义：不能伤害无辜

2b00462f-e846-4d74-af8f-aa0fa389022c.name: Vow (Refuse no request for medical aid)

c6e4fba8-16f2-445f-8077-8a3f28ada66c.name: Judo
c6e4fba8-16f2-445f-8077-8a3f28ada66c.notes: 使得你获得每轮用两只手各招架一次的能力。
